alert.note: Alert for Howard; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:38AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mitchell and western Howard Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1037 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Adams, or 16 miles northeast of Osage, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Riceville around 1055 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lylahs Marsh County Park, Chester, Saratoga, County Roads T 54 And A 31, McIntire, Hayden Prairie, Bailey and County V 10 And 40th Street. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
